languages.text: {n}При виде вас молодой блюститель вытягивается и шумно сглатывает. Его голос подрагивает.{/n} "Ваша Светлость!.. Рады приветствовать вас здесь!"

traits.locale_text: {n}При виде вас молодой страж вытягивается и шумно сглатывает. Его голос подрагивает.{/n} "Ваша Светлость!.. Рады приветствовать вас здесь!"

languages.text: {n}Upon seeing you, the young enforcer stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice trembles as he says,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! We are honoured by your presence!"
languages.original_text: {n}При виде вас молодой блюститель вытягивается и шумно сглатывает. Его голос подрагивает.{/n} "Ваша Светлость!.. Рады приветствовать вас здесь!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the young guard stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice is shaking slightly.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!.. We are happy to welcome you here!"
{n}Upon seeing you, the young guard stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice is shaking slightly.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!.. We are happy to welcome you here!"
{n}Upon seeing you, the young guard stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice is quivering.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!.. We are happy to welcome you here!"
{n}Upon seeing you, the young guard stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice is quivering.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!.. We are happy to welcome you here!"
{n}Upon seeing you, the young enforcer stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice trembles as he says,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! We are honoured by your presence!"
{n}Upon seeing you, the young enforcer stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice trembles as he says,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! We are honoured by your presence!"

languages.text: {n}あなたを見ると、若いエンフォーサーが両手を脇にそろえ背筋をしゃんと伸ばし、ごくりとつばを飲む。声を震わせながら、こう言う。{/n}「陛下！…あなたのご臨席を光栄に思います！」
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the young enforcer stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice trembles as he says,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! We are honoured by your presence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたを見ると、若いエンフォーサーが両手を脇にそろえ背筋をしゃんと伸ばし、ごくりとつばを飲む。声を震わせながら、こう言う。{/n}「陛下！…あなたのご臨席を光栄に思います！」

languages.text: {n}一看到你，年轻的执法者猛地立正，用力地咽了一口唾沫，以颤抖的声音说道。{/n}“大人！……感谢您大驾光临！”
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the young enforcer stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice trembles as he says,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! We are honoured by your presence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}一看到你，年轻的卫兵猛地立正，用力地咽了一口唾沫，以颤抖的声音说道。{/n}“大人！……欢迎您大驾光临！”

languages.text: {n}En vous voyant, un jeune garde se met au garde-à-vous en déglutissant avec peine.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, {n}vous salue-t-il d'une voix tremblante.{/n} Votre présence nous honore au plus haut point ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the young enforcer stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice trembles as he says,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! We are honoured by your presence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}En vous voyant, un jeune garde se met au garde-à-vous en déglutissant avec peine.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, {n}vous salue-t-il d'une voix tremblante.{/n} C'est un plaisir de vous recevoir ! »

languages.text: {n}Al verte, el joven agente se pone firme y traga saliva. Le tiembla la voz mientras dice:{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}!... ¡Nos complace su presencia!».
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the young enforcer stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice trembles as he says,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! We are honoured by your presence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Al verte, el joven guardia se pone firme y traga saliva. Le tiembla la voz.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}!.. ¡Nos complace darle la bienvenida!».

languages.text: {n}Als die junge Wache dich sieht, geht sie in Habachtstellung und schluckt geräuschvoll. Mit zittriger Stimme sagt sie:{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Eure Anwesenheit ist eine große Ehre für uns!"
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the young enforcer stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice trembles as he says,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! We are honoured by your presence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als die junge Wache dich sieht, geht sie in Habachtstellung und schluckt geräuschvoll. Die Stimme des jungen Mannes zittert.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wir heißen Euch herzlich willkommen!"

languages.text: {n}Genç infazcı seni görünce nizami duruşa geçip yutkunuyor. Titrek sesiyle şu sözleri sarf ediyor:{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Şeref verdiniz efendim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the young enforcer stands at attention and swallows noisily. His voice trembles as he says,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! We are honoured by your presence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Genç infazcı seni görünce nizami duruşa geçip yutkunuyor. Titrek sesiyle şu sözleri sarf ediyor:{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Şeref verdiniz efendim!"
